title: Tree thinking for tuberculosis evolution and epidemiology
questions: What information can I get from a phylogenetic tree?
How do I estimate a phylogeny?
objectives: Understand the basic concepts behind phylogenetic trees, as applied to *Mycobacterium tuberculosis*
Be able to read and interrogate a phylogeny encountered in the literature

workflows.name: Mtb phylogeny
workflows.title: Mtb phylogeny
workflows.description: Estimate a phylogenetic tree from whole genome sequencing data for M. tuberculosis
